thread.section_title: GoDISH Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GoDISH | godish.com
thread.title: ShaRhonda

author: ShaRhonda
title: ShaRhonda
text: I was Quote: d a price for television and internet. I paid for both over the phone with the representative Clinton and he said everything was fine and the technician would out the next day. He came installed the television service. When asked about the internet he said he didn't have a work order. I called in and everybody seems lost as to why I paid what i paid and why I don't have an internet order. This is the worst company and I am cancelling immediately. Not even a full day of service.
